RSLJAF
Soul Calibur Legends (JP)

Infinite HP (1P) [ZiT]
04407588 000003E8

Infinite SP (1P) [ZiT]
0440FF04 000004B0

Infinite HP (2P) [ZiT]
0440FF98 000003E8

Infinite SP (2P) [ZiT]
04418914 000004B0

Special Skill Always Effective [ZiT]
0402BA3C 60000000

Character Change [ZiT]
0040740D 000000xx
xx=Character
00=Mitsurugi
01=Taki
02=Sophitia
03=Ivy
04=Siegfried
05=Astaroth
06=Lloyd

Character Color [ZiT]
0040740E 000000xx
xx=Color
00=Default
10=Color 2

Camera

E0000000 80008000

82200000 804F6E10

E0000000 80008000
